sentences.en: Are you a good swimmer? -- Just so - so. I can't swim far.
sentences.cn: 你的游泳技术 怎么样 ? -- 马马虎虎, 游不远.

sentences.en: Bill is both a good swimmer and a good cook.
sentences.cn: 比尔不仅是个游泳好手,而且是个烹调能手.

sentences.en: Cross-currents can sweep the strongest swimmer helplessly away.
sentences.cn: 即使最强壮的游泳者也会无助地被交叉水流冲走。

sentences.en: He's a very good swimmer and often races.
sentences.cn: 他是个优秀游泳选手,经常参加比赛.

sentences.en: It'surprised them that she was such a fine swimmer.
sentences.cn: 她游得这么好,使他们都很惊奇.

sentences.en: She loved the virile young swimmer.
sentences.cn: 她爱上了那个有男子气概的年轻游泳运动员.

sentences.en: She wants to become an Olympic swimmer.
sentences.cn: 她想成为一名能够参加奥运会的游泳运动员。

sentences.en: The swimmer dived into the river to save the drowning child.
sentences.cn: 这位游泳者跳入河里去营救那个溺水的小孩.

sentences.en: The swimmer emerged from the lake.
sentences.cn: 游泳者从湖水中浮出来。
这个游泳的人突然抽筋.

sentences.en: The swimmer was striving against the current.
sentences.cn: 游泳者正在和激浪搏斗.

sentences.en: The swimmer was swept away by the current.
sentences.cn: 那个游泳的人被激流卷走了.

sentences.en: The swimmer won a bronze in the free style.
sentences.cn: 那位游泳选手赢得了自由泳的铜牌.

sentences.en: You don't have to worry about me. I'm a good swimmer.
sentences.cn: 你不用担心我。我水性很好。

words.tran_cn: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

trans.tran_en: someone who swims well, often as a competitor
